items.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to Isaac Sim
items.description: Get started with NVIDIA Isaac Sim for robotics simulation

items.title: Chapter 2: Robot Models & URDF
items.description: Learn how to create and use Unified Robot Description Format (URDF) files to define robot models for simulation in Isaac Sim

items.title: Chapter 3: Sensors & Physics Simulation
items.description: Learn how to configure and use various sensors in Isaac Sim, understand physics simulation parameters, and create realistic sensor data

items.description: Learn to install, configure, and navigate NVIDIA Isaac Sim for robotics simulation, including ROS 2 bridge setup and basic scene creation
